backend/main.mo: Defines the ICP backend actor with a `processRequest` function that performs HTTP GET outcalls via the OutCall module, and a `transform` query for response transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Maps three product features (frontend UI, HTML link rewriting, terminal aesthetic) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining light and dark OKLCH CSS custom properties for the shadcn-ui design token system.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a `#root` div and loads `main.tsx` as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component implementing a terminal-styled proxy browser with URL input, back/forward/reload navigation, sandboxed iframe display, and browsing history management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a `useProxyRequest` React Query mutation hook that calls the backend `processRequest` actor method with a URL and returns the proxied HTML string.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing JetBrains Mono, defining a dark terminal/neon OKLCH color theme, custom scrollbar styles, and neon glow utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps `App` with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` before rendering into the DOM root.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteHtml.ts: Utility that rewrites relative URLs in proxied HTML (anchors, media, scripts, links, forms, inline styles) to absolute URLs and injects a `<base>` tag, plus a helper to extract the page title.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining a dark terminal/hacker theme with neon-green accents, monospace fonts, oklch-based color tokens, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a server-side proxy website, tracking existing features (UI, link rewriting, dark aesthetic) and pending feature requests (backend Motoko HTTP outcalls, URL input, response rewriting).
